publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-682 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Licensing (Mandatory Conditions No. 2) (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Licensing (Mandatory Conditions No. 2) (Scotland) Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-682 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Licensing (Mandatory Conditions No. 2) (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Licensing (Mandatory Conditions No. 2) (Scotland) Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
